name: Ari's Rescue Crew
description:
Created for the GMTK Game Jam of 2021, with the theme 'joined together'. 

In Ari's Rescue Crew, play as a rescue boat that is trying to tow the various unfortunate boats wrecked in the Periculan Sea. Avoid pirate submarines, deadly rocks and horrifying sharks, and bring your rescues to safety.

However, your rescuing... isn't exactly heroic. Get reviews on shellp.com on how well you did, and be ready to face some words harsh enough to put you out of business!

Important

You need to sail away from the island for things to spawn. if you stay at the island nothing will happen.

Controls

W, A, S, D or  Arrow keys    =    Move

E = Interact (Attach Ships, Drop off ships at dock)

Mouse Click = Interact with UI (Click shell icon to pull up Shellp website)

Objective:

You need to find ships that need help and bring them back to the docks of the main island and press "E" near the docks.   The ships you bring back will leave reviews on Shellp that will affect your Crew's overall rating. Don't drop to  one star in your overall rating or it's over.

Gray Arrow points towards the Main Island

Green Arrow points towards ships to save

Red Arrow points towards enemy
